project.name: |-- 001-basic-threading
project.description:
Keywords:
This project includes very simple examples involving Threading.
ThreadDemo: Demonstrates how to create a simple multithreaded application as a class that extends from Thread.
ThreadDemo2: Demonstrates how to create a simple multithreaded application by creating a class that is instantiated from another class. The application is implemented as a Swing application with a single button that you can click to create a new thread.
RunnableDemo: Demonstrates how to implement a Runnable and start its execution from the main.
MultipleThreadsDemo: Demonstrates how to implement Swing application with a couple of threads that perform a count up and a count down in the background. Those threads are creates as nested classes within the main swing app.
ThreadPriorityDemo: Demonstrates how to adjust the priority of a thread. A Swing application is created with a couple of textfields counters that are adjusted by threads created with different priorities. Note that in my machine, both counters run at the same rate although one of the counters is running with different priority.
